text:
Hide Transcript

[MUSIC] I am Benedict Cumberbatch actor, and I'm teaming up with Omaze to fly you and a friend out to Los Angeles to attend the world premiere of my next student film Avengers Infinity war. And seeing as well, we'll be in LA at the same time, it's the perfect opportunity for us to meet for tea and delightful conversation. The best part of this is that every donation benefits the Geanco foundation. Their mission is to save and transform the lives of the poor and vulnerable in Africa. And they're a charity very dear to my heart. [MUSIC] [NOISE] [MUSIC] I'm a little teapot. Short and stout. This is my handle and this my spout. When I get all steamed up hear me shout, tip me over and pour me out. [BLANK_AUDIO]

title: Benedict Cumberbatch Performs Dramatic Rendition of 'I'm a Little Teapot'

meta_data.description: You could win a chance to have an Avengers: Infinity War-themed tea party with him.   ...
